Canticles English.Title: Above all powers
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Above all powers
 Above all kings,
 Above all nature
 And all created things
 Above all wisdom
 And all the ways of man
 You were here
 Before the world began
 
 Above all kingdoms
 Above all thrones
 Above all wonders
 The world has ever known
 Above all wealth
 And treasures of the earth
 There's no way to measure
 What youâ€™re worth
 
 Crucified, Laid behind a stone,
 You lived to die,
 Rejected and alone,
 Like a rose, Trampled on the ground,
 You took the fall
 And thought of me
 Above all

Canticles English.Title: Light of the world
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Light of the world
 You stepped down into darkness.
 Opened my eyes, let me see.
 Beauty that made this heart adore You
 Hope of a life spent with You
 
 Here I am to worship,
 Here I am to bow down,
 Here I am to say that You're my God
 You're altogether lovely
 Altogether worthy,
 Altogether wonderful to me
 
 King of all days
 Oh, so highly exalted
 Glorious in heaven above
 Humbly You came
 To the earth You created
 All for loveâ€™s sake, became poor

Canticles English.Title: Give thanks with a grateful heart
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Give thanks with a grateful heart
 Give thanks to the Holy One
 Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son
 
 And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
 Let the poor say, "I am rich
 Because of what the Lord has done for us"

Canticles English.Title: When I look into Your holiness
Canticles English.Lyrics:
When I look into Your holiness
 When I gaze into Your loveliness
 When all things that surround become shadows In the light of You
 
 I worship You, I worship You
 The reason I live is to worship You
 I worship You, I worship You
 The reason I live is to worship You
 
 When I've found the joy of reaching Your heart
 When my will becomes enthralled in Your love
 When all things that surround become shadows in the light of You

Canticles English.Title: Lord I lift Your name on high
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Lord I lift Your name on high
 Lord I love to sing Your praises
 I'm so glad Your in my life
 I'm so glad You came to save us
 
 You came from heaven to earth to show the way
 From the earth to the cross my debt to pay, From the cross to the grave from the grave to the sky
 Lord I lift Your name on high

Canticles English.Title: O worship the King all-glorious above,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
O worship the King all-glorious above,
 O gratefully sing his power and his love:
 our shield and defender, the Ancient of Days,
 pavilioned in splendor and girded with praise.
 
 Immortal, invisible, God only wise,
 In light inaccessible hid from our eyes,
 Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,
 Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise.
 
 whose robe is the light, whose canopy space.
 His chariots of wrath the deep thunderclouds form,
 and dark is his path on the wings of the storm.
 
 Hallelujah! what a Savior!
 Hallelujah! what a friend!
 Saving, helping, keeping, loving,
 He is with me to the end
 
 Praise, my soul, the King of heaven;
 to his feet your tribute bring.
 Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven,
 Who like Thee his praise should sing
 Alleluia, alleluia!
 Praise the everlasting King(2)
 
 in you do we trust, nor find you to fail.
 Your mercies, how tender, how firm to the end,
 our Maker, Defender, Redeemer, and Friend!
 
 Oh, perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
 To every believer the promise of God;
 The vilest offender who truly believes,
 That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.
 
 Sing, O sing of my Redeemer!
 With his blood he purchased me;
 on the cross he sealed my pardon,
 paid the debt, and made me free
 
 whom angels delight to worship above!
 the humbler creation, though feeble their lays,
 with true adoration shall all sing thy praise.
 
 Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
 Let the earth hear His voice;
 Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
 Let the people rejoice;
 Oh, come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
 And give Him the glory; great things He hath done.
 
 Alleluia, alleluia!
 Praise the everlasting King (2)

Canticles English.Title: Father in heaven,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Father in heaven,
 how we love you.
 We lift your Name in all the earth.
 May your kingdom, be established in our praises,
 As your people declare your mighty works.
 
 Blessed be the Lord God Almighty
 Who was and is, and is, to come.
 Blessed be the Lord God Almighty.
 Who reigns forever more.

Canticles English.Title: Meekness and majesty,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Meekness and majesty,
 Manhood and Deity,
 In perfect harmony,
 The Man who is God.
 Lord of eternity
 Dwells in humanity,
 Kneels in humility
 And washes our feet.
 
 O what a mystery,
 Meekness and majesty.
 Bow down and worship
 For this is your God,
 This is your God.
 
 b) Father's pure radiance,
 Perfect in innocence,
 Yet learns obedience
 To death on a cross.
 Suffering to give us life,
 Conquering through sacrifice,
 And as they crucify
 Prays: 'Father forgive.'
 
 c) Wisdom unsearchable,
 God the invisible,
 Love indestructible
 In frailty appears.
 Lord of infinity,
 Stooping so tenderly,
 Lifts our humanity
 To the heights of His throne.

Canticles English.Title: Joyful, joyful, we adore You,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Joyful, joyful, we adore You,
 God of glory, Lord of love;
 Hearts unfold like flow'rs before You,
 Op'ning to the sun above.
 Melt the clouds of sin and sadness;
 Drive the dark of doubt away;
 Giver of immortal gladness,
 Fill us with the light of day!
 
 b) All Your works with joy surround You, Earth and heav'n reflect Your rays,
 Stars and angels sing around You,
 Center of unbroken praise;
 Field and forest, vale and mountain,
 Flow'ry meadow, flashing sea,
 Chanting bird and flowing fountain, Praising You eternally!
 
 c) Always giving and forgiving,
 Ever blessing, ever blest,
 Well-spring of the joy of living,
 Ocean-depth of happy rest!
 Loving Father, Christ our Brother,
 Let Your light upon us shine;
 Teach us how to love each other,
 Lift us to the joy divine.
 
 d) Mortals, join the mighty chorus,
 Which the morning stars began;
 God's own love is reigning oâ€™er us,
 Joining people hand in hand.
 Ever singing, march we onward,
 Victors in the midst of strife;
 Joyful music leads us sunward
 In the triumph song of life.

Canticles English.Title: Jesus, name above all names
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Jesus, name above all names
 Beautiful Savior, glorious Lord.
 Emmanuel, God is with us.
 Blessed Redeemer, Living word.

Canticles English.Title: We worship and adore Thee
Canticles English.Lyrics:
We worship and adore Thee
 Bowing down before Thee
 Songs of praises singing
 Hallelujahs ringing
 Hallelujah, Hallelujah
 Hallelujah, Amen

Canticles English.Title: No other name but the name of Jesus
Canticles English.Lyrics:
No other name but the name of Jesus
 No other name but the name
 Of the Lord
 No other name but the name of Jesus
 Is worthy of honour
 And worthy of worship
 And worthy of power and praise

Canticles English.Title: All hail the Lamb
Canticles English.Lyrics:
All hail the Lamb
 enthroned on high
 His praise shall be our battle cry
 He reigns victorious
 Forever glorious
 His name is Jesus
 He is the Lord

Canticles English.Title: Your only Son, no sin to hide
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Your only Son, no sin to hide
 But You have sent Him from Your side
 To walk upon this guilty sod
 And to become the Lamb of God
 
 b) Your gift of love, they crucified
 They laughed and scorned Him as He died
 The humble King, they named a fraud
 And sacrificed the Lamb of God
 
 Oh, Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God
 I love the holy Lamb of God
 Oh, wash me in His precious blood
 My Jesus Christ, the Lamb of God
 
 c) I was so lost, I should have died
 But You have brought me to Your side
 To be led by Your staff and rod
 And to be called a lamb of God

Canticles English.Title: Jesus Christ, I think upon your sacrifice,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Jesus Christ, I think upon your sacrifice,
 You became nothing, poured out to death
 Many times, Iâ€™ve wondered at your gift of life
 And Iâ€™m in that place once again,
 Iâ€™m in that place once again.
 
 And once again, I look upon
 The cross where you died,
 Iâ€™m humbled by your mercy
 And Iâ€™m broken inside,
 Once again I thank you,
 Once again I pour out my life.
 
 Now you are, exalted to the highest place,
 King of the heavens, where one day Iâ€™ll bow.
 But for now, I marvel at this saving grace,
 And Iâ€™m full of praise once again,
 Iâ€™m full of praise once again.
 
 Thank you for the cross-3
 My Lord-2

Canticles English.Title: I stand amazed in the presence
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I stand amazed in the presence
 Of Jesus the Nazarene,
 And wonder how He could love me, A sinner, condemned, unclean.
 
 O how marvelous!
 O how wonderful!
 And my song shall ever be:
 O how marvelous!
 O how wonderful!
 Is my Saviorâ€™s love for me!
 
 b) For me it was in the garden
 He prayed: â€œNot My will, but Thine.â€
 He had no tears for His own griefs,
 But sweat drops of blood for mine.
 
 c) He took my sins and my sorrows,
 He made them His very own;
 He bore the burden to Calvary,
 And suffered and died alone.
 
 d) When with the ransomed in glory
 His face I at last shall see,
 â€™Twill be my joy through the ages
 To sing of His love for me.

Canticles English.Title: You are beautiful beyond description
Canticles English.Lyrics:
You are beautiful beyond description
 Too marvelous for words
 Too wonderful for comprehension
 Like nothing ever seen or heard
 Who can grasp Your infinite wisdom
 Who can fathom the depths of Your love
 You are beautiful beyond description
 Majesty, enthroned above
 
 And I stand, I stand in awe of You
 I stand, I stand in awe of You
 Holy God to whom all praise is due
 I stand in awe of You
 
 You are beautiful beyond description
 Yet God crushed You for my sin
 In agony and deep affliction
 Cut off that I might enter in
 Who can grasp such tender compassion?
 Who can fathom this mercy so free?
 You are beautiful beyond description
 Lamb of God who died for me

Canticles English.Title: Come let us worship and bow down,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Come let us worship and bow down,
 Let us kneel before the Lord, Our God and Maker.
 For he is our God, And we are the people of his pasture,
 And the sheep of his hand,
 Just the sheep of his hand.

Canticles English.Title: All heaven declares
Canticles English.Lyrics:
All heaven declares
 The glory of the risen Lord
 Who can compare with
 The beauty of the Lord
 
 Forever He will be
 The Lamb upon the throne
 I gladly bow the knee
 And worship Him alone
 
 I will proclaim
 The glory of the risen Lord
 Who once was slain
 To reconcile man to God

Canticles English.Title: I love you, Lord,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I love you, Lord,
 And I lift my voice
 To worship You
 Oh, my soul, rejoice!
 
 Take joy my King, in what You hear
 Let it be a sweet, sweet sound
 In Your ear.

Canticles English.Title: My Jesus, My Saviour,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
My Jesus, My Saviour,
 Lord there is no one like you,
 All of my days, I want to praise
 The wonders of Your mighty love.
 My comfort, my shelter,
 Tower of refuge and strength
 Let every breath, all that I am
 Never cease to worship You.
 
 Shout to the Lord, all the earth let us sing,
 Power and majesty, praise to the King!
 Mountains bow down and the seas will roar,
 At the sound of your name!
 I sing for joy at the work of your hands,
 Forever I'll love you, forever I'll stand
 Nothing compares to the promise I have in You.

Canticles English.Title: Thank you Jesus, Thank you Jesus
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Thank you Jesus, Thank you Jesus
 Thank you Lord for loving me
 Thank you Jesus, Thank you Jesus
 Thank you Lord for loving me
 
 You went to Calvary
 There you died for me
 Thank you Lord for loving me (rep)
 
 You rose up from the grave
 To me new life you gave
 Thank you Lord for loving me (rep)

Canticles English.Title: From heaven you came,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
From heaven you came,
 helpless babe, Entered our world, your glory veiled;
 Not to be served but to serve,
 And give your life that we might live.
 
 This is our God, the Servant King,
 He calls us now to follow him,
 To bring our lives as a daily offering
 Of worship to the Servant King.
 
 b) There in the garden of tears,
 My heavy load he chose to bear;
 His heart with sorrow was torn,
 'Yet not my will but yours,' he said.
 
 c) Come, see his hands and his feet,
 The scars that speak of sacrifice,
 Hands that flung stars into space
 To cruel nails surrendered.
 
 d) So let us learn how to serve,
 And in our lives enthrone him;
 Each other's needs to prefer,
 For it is Christ we're serving.

Canticles English.Title: Here is love, vast as the ocean,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Here is love, vast as the ocean,
 Loving kindness as the flood,
 When the Prince of Life, our Ransom,
 Shed for us His precious blood.
 Who His love will not remember?
 Who can cease to sing His praise?
 He can never be forgotten,
 Throughout Heavâ€™nâ€™s eternal days.
 
 b) On the mount of crucifixion,
 Fountains opened deep and wide;
 Through the floodgates of Godâ€™s mercy
 Flowed a vast and gracious tide.
 Grace and love, like mighty rivers,
 Poured incessant from above,
 And Heavâ€™nâ€™s peace and perfect justice
 Kissed a guilty world in love.
 
 c) Let me all Thy love accepting,
 Love Thee, ever all my days;
 Let me seek Thy kingdom only
 And my life be to Thy praise;
 Thou alone shalt be my glory,
 Nothing in the world I see.
 Thou hast cleansed and sanctified me,
 Thou Thyself hast set me free.
 
 d) In Thy truth Thou dost direct me
 By Thy Spirit through Thy Word;
 And Thy grace my need is meeting,
 As I trust in Thee, my Lord.
 Of Thy fullness Thou art pouring
 Thy great love and power on me,
 Without measure, full and boundless,
 Drawing out my heart to Thee.

Canticles English.Title: His praise fills the temple
Canticles English.Lyrics:
His praise fills the temple
 His peace fills my heart
 His joy and his glory
 He did wondrously impart
 The blessed name of Jesus
 Brought me freedom from sin
 Now his praise fills the temple
 And his spirit dwells within

Canticles English.Title: The love of God is greater far
Canticles English.Lyrics:
The love of God is greater far
 Than tongue or pen can ever tell;
 It goes beyond the highest star,
 And reaches to the lowest hell;
 The guilty pair, bowed down with care,
 God gave His Son to win;
 His erring child He reconciled,
 And pardoned from his sin.
 
 O love of God, how rich and pure!
 How measureless and strong!
 It shall forevermore endure
 The saintsâ€™ and angelsâ€™ song.
 
 b) When years of time shall pass away,
 And earthly thrones and kingdoms fall,
 When men, who here refuse to pray,
 On rocks and hills and mountains call,
 Godâ€™s love so sure, shall still endure,
 All measureless and strong;
 Redeeming grace to Adamâ€™s raceâ€”
 The saintsâ€™ and angelsâ€™ song.
 
 c) Could we with ink the ocean fill,
 And were the skies of parchment made,
 Were every stalk on earth a quill,
 And every man a scribe by trade,
 To write the love of God above,
 Would drain the ocean dry.
 Nor could the scroll contain the whole,
 Though stretched from sky to sky.

Canticles English.Title: How deep the Father's love for us,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
How deep the Father's love for us,
 How vast beyond all measure
 That He should give His only Son
 To make a wretch His treasure
 How great the pain of searing loss,
 The Father turns His face away
 As wounds which mar the chosen One,
 Bring many sons to glory
 
 b) Behold the Man upon a cross,
 My sin upon His shoulders
 Ashamed I hear my mocking voice,
 Call out among the scoffers
 It was my sin that held Him there
 Until it was accomplished
 His dying breath has brought me life
 I know that it is finished
 
 c) I will not boast in anything
 No gifts, no power, no wisdom
 But I will boast in Jesus Christ
 His death and resurrection
 Why should I gain from His reward?
 I cannot give an answer
 But this I know with all my heart
 His wounds have paid my ransom

Canticles English.Title: Ascribe greatness to our God, the Rock,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Ascribe greatness to our God, the Rock,
 His work is perfect and all His ways are just.
 Ascribe greatness to our God, the Rock,
 His work is perfect and all His ways are just.
 
 A God of faithfulness and without injustice,
 Good and upright is He;
 A God of faithfulness and without injustice,
 Good and upright is He.

Canticles English.Title: On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross,
 The emblem of suffâ€™ring and shame;
 And I love that old cross where the dearest and best
 For a world of lost sinners was slain.
 
 So Iâ€™ll cherish the old rugged cross,
 Till my trophies at last I lay down;
 I will cling to the old rugged cross,
 And exchange it someday for a crown.
 
 b) Oh, that old rugged cross, so despised by the world,
 Has a wondrous attraction for me;
 For the dear Lamb of God left His glory above
 To bear it to dark Calvary.
 
 c) In that old rugged cross, stained with blood so divine,
 A wondrous beauty I see,
 For â€™twas on that old cross Jesus suffered and died,
 To pardon and sanctify me.
 
 d) To the old rugged cross I will ever be true;
 Its shame and reproach gladly bear;
 Then Heâ€™ll call me some day to my home far away,
 Where His glory forever Iâ€™ll share.

Canticles English.Title: I have placed all my hope
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I have placed all my hope
 in a crucified man
 In the wounds in his side, his feet and his hands
 I have traded my pride for a share in his shame
 And the glory that one-day will burst from his pain
 I've abandoned my trust in the wise and the proud
 For this fragile, mysterious weakness of God
 And I dare to believe in his scandalous claim
 That his blood cleanses sin for who ever will call on his name
 Live or die here I stand
 Iâ€™ve placed my hope in a crucified man
 
 I believe as they beat on his beautiful face
 He turned a torturerâ€™s chair to an altar of grace
 Where the worst we can do met the best that God does
 Where unspeakable hate met the gaze of unstoppable love
 At the crux of it all there he hangs
 Iâ€™ve placed my hope in a crucifiedâ€¦
 Man of sorrows man of grief
 Will he stay beyond belief?
 
 When the purest and best took the force of our curse
 Deathâ€™s victory armada juddered into reverse.
 And either we bow or we stumble and fall
 For the wisdom of a suffering God
 Has made fools of us all
 I gladly admit that I am
 But I've placed my hope in a crucifiedâ€¦.
 Man of sorrows man of grief
 Will he stay beyond belief?
 
 I have buried my life in the cold earth with him
 Like a seed in the winter, I wait for the spring
 From that garden of tombs Eden rises again
 And Paradise blooms from his body
 And never will end
 He'll finish all he began
 Creation hopes in a crucified man
 
 When I stand at the judgement
 Iâ€™ve no other plan
 I've placed my hope in a crucified man
 Like the thief nailed beside him
 Iâ€™ve no other plan
 I've placed my hope in a crucified man

Canticles English.Title: I worship you, Almighty God
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I worship you, Almighty God
 There is none like you
 I worship you, Oh Prince of peace
 That is what I want to do
 I give you praise
 For you are my righteousness
 I worship you, Almighty God
 There is none like you
 (repeat)

Canticles English.Title: Father God, I wonder how I
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Father God, I wonder how I
 managed to exist
 Without the knowledge of your parenthood and your loving care.
 But now I am your child, I am adopted in your family,
 And I can never be alone,
 'Cause Father God, you're there beside me.
 
 I will sing your praises,
 I will sing your praises,
 I will sing your praises,
 Forever more. (2)

Canticles English.Title: He came to earth, not to be served
Canticles English.Lyrics:
He came to earth, not to be served
 But gave His life to be a ransom for many
 The Son of God, the Son of man
 He shared our pain and bore our sins in His body
 
 King of kings and Lord of lords
 I lift my voice in praise
 Such amazing love, but I do believe
 This King has died for me
 
 b) And so I stand, a broken soul
 To see the pain that I have brought to Jesus
 And yet each heart will be consoled
 To be made new, the joy of all believers
 
 c) And from now on, through all my days
 I vow to live each moment here for Jesus
 Not looking back, but giving praise
 For all my Lord has done for this believer

Canticles English.Title: We are here to praise you
Canticles English.Lyrics:
We are here to praise you
 Lift our hearts and sing
 We are here to give You
 The best that we can bring
 And it is our love
 Rising from our hearts
 Everything within us cries
 'Abba Father'
 Help us now to give You
 Pleasure and delight
 Heart and mind and will that say
 'I love You Lord'

Canticles English.Title: Glory to Thee;
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Glory to Thee;
 Thou Son of God most High.
 All praise to Thee!
 Glory to Thee,
 enthroned above the sky,
 Who died for me;
 High on Thy throne,
 Thine ear, Lord Jesus, bend
 As grateful hearts
 now to Thyself ascend.
 
 b) Deep were Thy sorrows, Lord,
 when heaven frownedâ€”
 Gethsemane!
 Bloodlike Thy sweat, Lord,
 Falling to the ground
 So heavily;
 Dark was the night,
 but heaven was darker still,
 O Christ my God!â€”
 Is this the Fatherâ€™s will?
 
 c) Thorns wreathed Thy brow
 when hanging on the tree,
 Manâ€™s cruelty!
 Why lavish love like this,
 O Lord, on me?
 Thou lovest me!
 Would that my soul could
 understand its length,
 Its breadth, depth, height,
 and everlasting strength!
 
 d) Thy precious blood was
 freely shed for me
 On Calvary
 To save me from a lost eternity;
 Glory to Thee!
 Nor death, nor hell,
 nor things belowâ€”above
 Can sever me from Thy eternal love.
 
 e) Like shoreless seas,
 Thy love can know no bound;
 Thou lovest me!
 Deep, vast, immense,
 unfathomed, Lordâ€”profound,
 Lord, I love Thee!
 And when above,
 my crown is at Thy feet,
 Iâ€™ll praise Thee still for
 Calvaryâ€™s mercy seat.

Canticles English.Title: There is a Redeemer,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
There is a Redeemer,
 Jesus, God's own Son,
 Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
 Holy One,
 
 Thank you oh my Father,
 For giving us Your Son,
 And leaving Your Spirit,
 'Til the work on Earth is done.
 
 Jesus my Redeemer,
 Name above all names,
 Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
 Hope for sinners slain.

Canticles English.Title: Lord I stand
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Lord I stand
 in the midst of a multitude
 Of those from every tribe and tongue
 We are Your people redeemed by Your blood
 Rescued from death by Your love
 There are no words
 Good enough to thank You
 There are no words to express my praise
 But I will lift up my voice
 And sing from my heart
 With all of my strength
 
 Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
 To the Lamb
 Hallelujah hallelujah
 By the blood of Christ we stand
 Every tongue every tribe
 Every people every land
 Giving glory giving honor
 Giving praise unto the Lamb of God
 
 Lord we stand by grace in Your presence
 Cleansed by the blood of the Lamb
 We are Your children called by Your name
 Humbly we bow and we pray
 Release Your power
 To work in us and through us
 Till we are changed To be more like You
 Then all the nations will see
 Your glory revealed, And worship You

Canticles English.Title: Sing Hallelujah to the Lord
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord
 Sing Hallelujah to the Lord
 Sing Hallelujah, sing Hallelujah
 Sing Hallelujah to the Lord
 
 Jesus is risen from the dead
 
 Jesus is Lord of heaven and earth
 
 Jesus is living in His church
 
 Jesus is coming for His own

Canticles English.Title: Hail Jesus, you're my King
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Hail Jesus, you're my King
 Your life frees me to sing
 I will praise you all my days
 You're perfect in all your ways
 
 Hail Jesus, you're my Lord
 I will obey your word
 I want to see your kingdom come
 Not my will but yours be done
 
 Glory, glory to the Lamb
 You'll take m' in to the land
 We will conquer in your name
 And proclaim that Jesus reigns
 
 Hail, hail Lion of Judah
 How powerful you are
 Hail, hail Lion of Judah
 How wonderful you are

Canticles English.Title: In Christ alone my hope is found;
Canticles English.Lyrics:
In Christ alone my hope is found;
 He is my light, my strength, my song;
 This cornerstone, this solid ground,
 Firm through the fiercest drought and storm.
 What heights of love, what depths of peace,
 When fears are stilled, when strivings cease!
 My comforter, my all in allâ€”
 Here in the love of Christ I stand.
 
 b) In Christ alone, Who took on flesh,
 Fullness of God in helpless babe!
 This gift of love and righteousness,
 Scorned by the ones He came to save.
 Till on that cross as Jesus died,
 The wrath of God was satisfied;
 For ev'ry sin on Him was laidâ€”
 Here in the death of Christ I live.
 
 c) There in the ground His body lay,
 Light of the world by darkness slain;
 Then bursting forth in glorious day,
 Up from the grave He rose again!
 And as He stands in victory,
 Sin's curse has lost its grip on me;
 For I am His and He is mineâ€”
 Bought with the precious blood of Christ.
 
 d) No guilt in life, no fear in deathâ€”
 This is the pow'r of Christ in me;
 From life's first cry to final breath,
 Jesus commands my destiny.
 No pow'r of hell, no scheme of man,
 Can ever pluck me from His hand;
 Till He returns or calls me home,
 Here in the power of Christ I'll stand.

Canticles English.Title: Come and see, come and see
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Come and see, come and see
 Come and see the King of love
 See the purple robe and crown of thorns he wears
 Soldiers mock, rulers sneer
 As he lifts the cruel cross
 Lone and friendless now he climbs towards the hill
 
 We worship at your feet
 Where wrath and mercy meet
 And a guilty world is washed
 By love's pure stream
 For us he was made sin
 Oh, help me take it in
 Deep wounds of love cry out 'Father, forgive'
 I worship, I worship
 The Lamb who was slain.
 
 b) Come and weep, come and mourn
 For your sin that pierced him there
 So much deeper than the wounds of thorn and nail
 All our pride, all our greed
 All our fallenness and shame
 And the Lord has laid the punishment on him
 
 d) Man of heaven, born to earth
 To restore us to your heaven
 Here we bow in awe beneath
 Your searching eyes
 From your tears comes our joy
 From your death our life shall spring
 By your resurrection power we shall rise

Canticles English.Title: What love could remember,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
What love could remember,
 no wrongs we have done
 Omniscient all-knowing, He counts not their sum
 Thrown into a sea, without bottom or shore
 Our sins they are many, His mercy is more
 
 Praise the Lord, His mercy is more
 Stronger than darkness, new every morn
 Our sins they are many, His mercy is more
 Praise the Lord, His mercy is more
 
 b) What patience would wait, as we constantly roam
 What Father so tender, is calling us home
 He welcomes the weakest, the vilest, the poor
 Our sins they are many, His mercy is more
 
 c) What riches of kindness, He lavished on us
 His blood was the payment, His life was the cost
 We stood 'neath a debt, we could never afford
 Our sins they are many, His mercy is more

Canticles English.Title: The Splendor of a king
Canticles English.Lyrics:
The Splendor of a king
 Clothed in majesty
 Let all the earth rejoice
 All the earth rejoice
 He wraps Himself in light,
 And darkness tries to hide
 And trembles at His voice
 Trembles at His voice
 
 How great is our God â€“ sing with me
 How great is our God â€“ and all will see
 How great, how great is our God
 
 Age to age He stands
 And time is in His hands
 Beginning and the end
 Beginning and the end
 
 The Godhead Three in One
 Father, Spirit and Son
 Lion and the Lamb
 Lion and the Lamb
 
 Name above all names
 Worthy of all praise
 My heart will sing
 How great is our God

Canticles English.Title: In moments like these
Canticles English.Lyrics:
In moments like these
 I sing out a song,
 I sing out a love song to Jesus.
 In moments like these I lift up my hands,
 I lift up my hands to the Lord.
 
 Singing I love You, Lord.
 Singing I love You, Lord.
 Singing I love You, Lord,
 I love You.

Canticles English.Title: When the music fades
Canticles English.Lyrics:
When the music fades
 All is stripped away
 And I simply come
 Longing just to bring
 Something that's of worth
 That will bless your heart
 
 I'll bring You more than a song
 For a song in itself
 Is not what You have required
 You search much deeper within
 Through the way things appear
 You're looking into my heart
 I'm coming back to the heart of worship
 And it's all about You
 It's all about You, Jesus
 I'm sorry, Lord, for the thing I've made it
 When it's all about You
 It's all about You, Jesus
 
 King of endless worth
 No one could express
 How much you deserve
 Though I'm weak and poor
 All I have is yours
 Every single breath

Canticles English.Title: You laid aside Your majesty
Canticles English.Lyrics:
You laid aside Your majesty
 Gave up everything for me,
 Suffered at the hands of those You had created.
 You took all my guilt and shame,
 When You died and rose again;
 Now today You reign,
 In heaven and earth exalted.
 
 I really want to worship You, my Lord,
 You have won my heart
 And I am Yours for ever and ever;
 I will love You.
 You are the only one who died for me,
 Gave Your life to set me free,
 So I lift my voice to You in adoration.

Canticles English.Title: Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!
 Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
 Redeemed through His infinite mercy,
 His child and forever I am.
 
 Redeemed, redeemed,
 Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
 Redeemed, redeemed,
 His child and forever I am.
 
 b) Redeemed, and so happy in Jesus,
 No language my rapture can tell;
 I know that the light of His presence
 With me doth continually dwell.
 
 c) I think of my blessÃ¨d Redeemer,
 I think of Him all the day long:
 I sing, for I cannot be silent;
 His love is the theme of my song.
 
 d) I know I shall see in His beauty
 The King in whose law I delight;
 Who lovingly guardeth my footsteps,
 And giveth me songs in the night.
 
 e) I know thereâ€™s a crown that is waiting,
 In yonder bright mansion for me,
 And soon, with the spirits made perfect,
 At home with the Lord I shall be.

Canticles English.Title: What wondrous love is this,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
What wondrous love is this,
 O my soul, O my soul!
 What wondrous love is this, O my soul!
 What wondrous love is this,
 That caused the Lord of bliss,
 To bear the dreadful curse,
 For my soul, for my soul,
 To bear the dreadful curse for my soul.
 
 b) To God and to the Lamb, I will sing, I will sing!

Canticles English.Title: Merciful Savior
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Merciful Savior
 gracious Redeemer

 Search every corner cleanse every part

Canticles English.Lyrics:
And did the Holy and the Just,

 (Surprising mercy! love unknown!)

 b) Then, Oh! what loads of wrath unknown
 The glorious sufferer felt;
 For crimes unnumbered to atone, To expiate mortal guilt!
 The Fatherâ€™s blissful smile withdrawn,
 In that tremendous hour;
 Yet still the God sustained the man
 With his almighty power,
 
 c) He took the dying traitor's place,
 And suffered in his stead;
 For man (O miracle of grace!)
 For man the Savior bled!
 Dear Lord, what heavenly wonders dwell
 In Your atoning blood!
 By this are sinners snatched from Hell,
 And rebels brought to God!
 
 d) What glad return can I impart
 For favors so divine?
 O take my all, this worthless heart,

 On thee alone my hope relies: Beneath thy cross I fall,
 My Lord, my life, my sacrifice,
 My Savior and my all

Canticles English.Title: The Roman cross goes up in air,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
The Roman cross goes up in air,
 Hanging on it the Son of God,
 Mocked Rejected, Despised by all
 Led like a lamb to the slaughter
 â€ Father Forgive â€ , was then the cry
 Reaching the Great high throne of God;
 My head goes down & knees touch ground
 As only God can say such Words.
 
 b) My sins on Christ, the Son were laid,
 He making them His very own;
 He Bore the wrath deserved for each,
 Forsaken by Father in turn.
 â€œIt is finishedâ€ was then the cry,
 Reaching the Great high throne of God;
 Since then, my sins, yea all my sins,
 Are never found before His eyes.
 
 c) Almighty bows His head at last,
 The mountains quake, the veil is rent;
 Hanging between God and all men,
 The Sovereign breathes His last on earth.
 But where oh death, your victory,
 A broken seal & empty tomb;
 Not e'en a sting to hurt me now,
 Safe in the arms of Christ my Lord.
 
 d) Once filthy lips, now sing Thy praise,
 Once unclean hands, now raised to you,
 Eternity may all explain,
 How you and me should be made one.
 Oh look how sweet to call Thee Mineâ€™
 Abba Father, I cry out loud;
 And as I stand before Thy throne,
 Impossible, sure has been done,

Canticles English.Title: He gave me beauty for ashes
Canticles English.Lyrics:
He gave me beauty for ashes
 The oil of joy for mourning
 The garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness
 That we might be trees of
 Righteousness
 The planting of the Lord
 That He might be glorified

Canticles English.Title: Who is like unto thee
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Who is like unto thee
 O Lord among the Gods?
 Who is like unto thee
 Glorious in holiness
 Fearful in praises
 Doing wonders
 Who is like unto thee?

Canticles English.Title: You are the King of Glory
Canticles English.Lyrics:
You are the King of Glory
 You are the Prince of Peace
 You are the Lord of heaven and earth
 You are the Son of righteousness
 Angels bow down before You
 They worship and adore You
 For You have the words of eternal life
 You are Jesus Christ the Lord
 Hosanna to the Son of David
 Hosanna to the King of Kings
 Glory in the highest heavens
 Jesus the Messiah reigns

Canticles English.Title: I will sing of the mercies of the LORD
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I will sing of the mercies of the LORD
 Forever, I will sing, I will sing.
 I will sing of the mercies of the LORD
 Forever, I will sing
 Of the mercies of the LORD.
 With my mouth will I make known, your faithfulness your faithfulness;
 With my mouth will I make known
 your faithfulness to all generations.

Canticles English.Title: My glory and the lifter of my head
Canticles English.Lyrics:
My glory and the lifter of my head
 My glory and the lifter of my head
 For thou O Lord art a shield to me
 My glory and the lifter of my head
 
 I cried unto the Lord with my voice -3
 And he heard me out of his holy hill.

Canticles English.Title: Rolled away, rolled away, rolled away
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Rolled away, rolled away, rolled away
 Every burden of my heart rolled away
 (repeat)
 
 Every sin had to go
 Neath the cleansing flow

Canticles English.Title: Heavenly Father,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Heavenly Father,
 I appreciate You
 I love You, adore You, I bow down before You
 Heavenly Father, I appreciate You
 
 Son of God, what a wonder You are
 You cleansed my soul from sin, set the Holy Ghost within
 Son of God, what a wonder You are
 
 Holy Spirit, what a comfort You are You lead us, you guide us, You live right inside us
 Holy Spirit, what a comfort You are

Canticles English.Title: By grace alone somehow I stand
Canticles English.Lyrics:
By grace alone somehow I stand
 Where even angels fear to tread
 Invited by redeeming love
 Before the throne of God above
 He pulls me close with nail-scarred hands
 Into His everlasting arms
 
 b) When condemnation grips my heart
 And Satan tempts me to despair
 I hear the voice that scatters fear
 The Great I Am the Lord is here
 Oh praise the One who fights for me
 And shields my soul eternally
 
 Boldly I approach Your throne
 Blameless now I'm running home
 By Your blood I come
 Welcomed as Your own
 Into the arms of majesty
 
 c) Behold the bright and risen Son
 More beauty than this world has known
 I'm face to face with Love Himself
 His perfect spotless righteousness
 A thousand years, a thousand tongues,
 Are not enough to sing His praise

Canticles English.Title: Sweet Jesus, Sweet Jesus,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Sweet Jesus, Sweet Jesus,
 What a wonder you are...
 You a brighter than the morning star.
 You're fairer, much fairer than the lily that grows by the wayside...
 Precious, more precious than gold.
 
 You are the rose of Sharon
 The fairest of them all
 You are everything my heart desires
 You are fairer, much fairer
 Than the lily that grows by the wayside
 You are precious, more precious than gold.

Canticles English.Title: Down from His glory,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Down from His glory,
 Ever living story,
 My God and Savior came,
 And Jesus was His name.
 Born in a manger,
 To His own a stranger,
 A Man of sorrows, tears and agony.
 
 O how I love Him! How I adore Him!
 My breath, my sunshine, my all in all!
 The great Creator became my Savior,
 And all Godâ€™s fulness dwelleth in Him.
 
 b) What condescension,
 Bringing us redemption;
 That in the dead of night,
 Not one faint hope in sight,
 God, gracious, tender,
 Laid aside His splendor,
 Stooping to woo, to win, to save my soul.
 
 c) Without reluctance,
 Flesh and blood His substance
 He took the form of man,
 Revealed the hidden plan.
 O glorious mystâ€™ry,
 Sacrifice of Calvâ€™ry,
 And now I know Thou art the great â€œI AM.â€

Canticles English.Title: One day when Heaven
Canticles English.Lyrics:
One day when Heaven
 Was filled with His praises,
 One day when sin was
 As black as could be,
 Jesus came forth
 To be born of a virgin,
 Dwelt among men, my example is He!
 
 Living, He loved me;
 Dying, He saved me;
 Buried, He carried My sins far away;
 Rising He justified freely forever:
 One day He's comingâ€”
 O glorious day!
 
 b) One day they led Him
 Up Calvary's mountain,
 One day they nailed Him
 To die on the tree;
 Suffering anguish,
 despised and rejected:
 Bearing our sins,
 my Redeemer is He!
 
 c) One day they left Him
 Alone in the garden,
 One day He rested,
 from suffering free;
 Angels came down
 o'er His tomb to keep vigil;
 Hope of the hopeless, my Savior is He!
 
 d) One day the grave
 Could conceal Him no longer,
 One day the stone rolled
 away from the door;
 Then He arose,
 over death He had conquered;
 Now is ascended, my Lord evermore!
 
 e)One day the trumpet
 Will sound for His coming,
 One day the skies With
 His glory will shine;
 Wonderful day, my beloved One bringing;
 Glorious Savior, this Jesus is mine

Canticles English.Title: Father into Your courts I will enter
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Father into Your courts I will enter
 Maker of Heaven and earth
 I tremble in Your holy presence
 Glory glory in Your sanctuary
 Splendor and majesty Lord
 Before You all life adores You
 
 All the earth will declare
 That Your love is everywhere
 The fields will exalt seas resound
 Hear the trees' joyful cry
 Praising You and so will I
 A new song I'll sing
 Lord I will glorify and bless Your Holy name
 
 
 Jesus Lord of all life and salvation
 Into Your presence we come
 We worship You our precious Savior
 Fill us fill us with Your Holy power
 Set us aflame with Your love
 'Til nations all know Your glory

Canticles English.Title: O what a wonderful,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
O what a wonderful,
 wonderful day,
 Day I will never forget;
 After I'd wandered in darkness away, Jesus my Savior I met.
 O what a tender, compassionate friend, He met the need of my heart;
 Shadows dispelling, with joy I am telling, He made all the darkness depart.
 
 Heaven came down and glory filled my soul,
 When at the cross the Savior made me whole;
 My sins were washed away and my night was turned to day,
 Heaven came down and glory filled my soul!
 
 b) Born of the Spirit with life from above, into God's family divine,
 Justified fully through Calvary's love, O what a standing is mine!
 And the transaction so quickly was made, when as a sinner I came,
 Took of the offer, of grace He did proffer,
 He saved me, O praise His dear name!
 
 c) Now I've a hope that will surely endure after the passing of time;
 I have a future in heaven for sure, There in those mansions sublime.
 And it's because of that wonderful day,
 when at the cross I believed;
 Riches eternal and blessings supernal, from His precious hand I received.

Canticles English.Title: God’s saints of old
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Godâ€™s saints of old
 Through history told
 Of the One who was to come:
 A son, a king,
 A Lamb to be slain
 For the sins of all the world.
 
 Heâ€™s the Promise of the Ages,
 Lifted up to save us,
 Jesus Christ, our sacrifice.
 Heâ€™s the Fount of living water,
 King and Friend forever,
 Bow before
 The Promise of the Ages.
 
 In flesh he came,
 Yet chose to remain
 With the outcast and the poor.
 He bled, he died,
 Was raised, glorified,
 Now he lives forever more!
 
 Lift your hands and sing â€˜hallelujahâ€™
 To the King of all the earth
 Raise your voice and sing â€˜hallelujahâ€™
 To the King of all the earth.
 
 How long until
 The earth will be filled
 With the knowledge of the Lord;
 When he shall come,
 When nations and tongues
 Will be joined in glorious song?

Canticles English.Title: Jesus is all the world to me:
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Jesus is all the world to me:
 My life, my joy, my all.
 He is my strength from day to day;
 Without Him I would fall.
 When I am sad, to Him I go;
 No other one can cheer me so.
 When I am sad, He makes me glad;
 Heâ€™s my Friend.
 
 b) Jesus is all the world to me,
 My Friend in trials sore.
 I go to Him for blessings, and
 He gives them oâ€™er and oâ€™er.
 He sends the sunshine and the rain;
 He sends the harvestâ€™s golden grain:
 Sunshine and rain, harvest of grainâ€”
 Heâ€™s my Friend.
 
 c) Jesus is all the world to me,
 And true to Him Iâ€™ll be.
 Oh, how could I this Friend deny
 When Heâ€™s so true to me?
 Following Him I know Iâ€™m right;
 He watches oâ€™er me day and night.
 Following Him by day and night,
 Heâ€™s my Friend.
 
 d) Jesus is all the world to me,
 I want no better friend.
 I trust Him now; Iâ€™ll trust Him when
 Lifeâ€™s fleeting days shall end.
 Beautiful life with such a Friend;
 Beautiful life that has no end!
 Eternal life, eternal joy,
 Heâ€™s my Friend.

Canticles English.Title: Happiness is to know the saviour
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Happiness is to know the saviour
 Living a life within his favour
 Having a change in my behaviour.
 Happiness is my Lord
 
 Real joy is mine
 No matter if tear drops start
 I've found the secret
 It's Jesus in my heart
 
 Happiness is a new creation
 Jesus and me in close relation
 Having a part in his salvation
 Happiness is the Lord
 
 Happiness is to be forgiven
 Living a life that's worth the living
 Taking a trip that leads to heaven
 Happiness is the Lord

Canticles English.Title: Lord Jesus, you’re more excellent
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Lord Jesus, youâ€™re more excellent
 Than Mosesâ€™ ancient covenant:
 Its Law you perfectly obeyed
 And on the cross its curse you paid.
 My Royal Priest is excellent
 Above the dying priests who went
 In yearly terror through the veilâ€”
 But once for all Christ did prevail.
 But once for all Christ did prevail.
 
 b) Lord Jesus, youâ€™re more excellent
 Than all the guardian angels sent
 To guide our steps both day and night,
 Since Jesus guards with sovereign might.
 Great Savior, youâ€™re more excellent
 Than all the Devilâ€™s arrows spent
 In furious rage against the ones
 For whom Christ died to make his sons.
 For whom Christ died to make his sons
 
 c) Kind Jesus, youâ€™re more excellent
 Than doubts and troubles I invent;
 Your life laid down, my victory wonâ€”
 My Advocate, Godâ€™s holy Son.
 O Christ, you are most excellent,
 By thâ€™new and better covenant:
 Redeeming Love who took my part,
 Inscribed your Law upon my heart.
 Inscribed your Law upon my heart
 
 O Righteous One, most excellent,
 Your cross fulfilled the covenant;
 O Worthy One, who took my place,

 I long to worship face to face.

Canticles English.Title: Don't you know it's time
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Don't you know it's time
 To praise the Lord
 In the sanctuary of His Holy Spirit
 So set your mind on Him
 And let your praise begin
 And the glory of the Lord
 Will fill this place
 Praise the Lord praise the Lord
 
 
 He lives within
 The praises of His people
 He loves to hear us
 Call upon His name
 So set your mind on Him
 And let your praise begin
 And the glory of the Lord
 Will fill this place
 Praise the Lord praise the Lord

Canticles English.Title: My worth is not in what I own
Canticles English.Lyrics:
My worth is not in what I own
 Not in the strength of flesh and bone
 But in the costly wounds of love
 At the cross
 My worth is not in skill or name
 In win or lose, in pride or shame
 But in the blood of Christ that flowed
 At the cross
 
 I rejoice in my Redeemer
 Greatest Treasure,
 Wellspring of my soul
 I will trust in Him, no other.
 My soul is satisfied in Him alone.
 
 b) As summer floâ€™ers we fade and die
 Fame, youth and beauty hurry by
 But life eternal calls to us
 At the cross
 
 c)I will not boast in wealth or might
 Or human wisdom's fleeting light
 But I will boast in knowing Christ
 At the cross
 Two wonders here that I confess
 My worth and my unworthiness
 My value fixed - my ransom paid
 At the cross

Canticles English.Title: All I once held dear,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
All I once held dear,
 built my life upon
 All this world reveres, and wars to own
 All I once thought gain I have counted loss
 Spent and worthless now, compared to this
 
 Knowing you, Jesus, knowing you,
 There is no greater thing
 You're my all, you're the best
 You're my joy, my righteousness
 And I love you, Lord
 
 b) Now my heart's desire is to know you more
 To be found in you and known as yours

 All-surpassing gift of righteousness
 
 c) Oh, to know the power of your risen life
 And to know You in Your sufferings

Canticles English.Title: Be Thou my Vision,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Be Thou my Vision,
 O Lord of my heart;
 Naught be all else to me, save that Thou art
 Thou my best Thought, by day or by night,
 Waking or sleeping, Thy presence my light.
 b) Be Thou my Wisdom, and Thou my true Word;
 I ever with Thee and Thou with me, Lord;
 Thou my great Father, I Thy true son;
 Thou in me dwelling, and I with Thee one.
 
 c) Be Thou my battle Shield, Sword for the fight;
 Be Thou my Dignity, Thou my Delight;
 Thou my soulâ€™s Shelter, Thou my high Tower:
 Raise Thou me heavenward, O Power of my power.
 
 d) Riches I heed not, nor manâ€™s empty praise,
 Thou mine Inheritance, now and always:
 Thou and Thou only, first in my heart,
 High King of Heaven, my Treasure Thou art.
 
 e) High King of Heaven, my victory won,
 May I reach Heavenâ€™s joys, O bright Heavenâ€™s Sun!

Canticles English.Title: Let the beauty of Jesus be seen in me,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Let the beauty of Jesus be seen in me,
 All his wonderful passion and purity,

Canticles English.Title: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,
 A wonderful Savior to me;
 He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,
 where rivers of pleasure I see.
 
 He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock

 He hideth my life in the depths of His love, and covers me there with His hand,
 And covers me there with His hand.
 
 b) A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,
 He taketh my burden away;
 He holdeth me up, and I shall not be moved;
 He giveth me strength as my day.
 
 c) With numberless blessings each moment He crowns,
 and filled with His fullness divine,
 I sing in my rapture, oh, glory to God,
 for such a Redeemer as mine!
 
 d) When clothed in His brightness, transported I rise
 To meet Him clouds of the sky,
 His perfect salvation, His wonderful love
 I'll shout with the millions on high.

Canticles English.Title: Jesus shall reign where’er the sun
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Jesus shall reign whereâ€™er the sun
 Doth his successive journeys run;
 His Kingdom stretch from shore to shore,
 Till moons shall wax and wane no more.
 
 He shall reign in glory
 crowned with grace and might
 Bless His name and praise the sovereign King
 He shall reign forever
 with His chosen bride
 And all the earth shall sing
 that Jesus is the King!
 
 b) People and realms of every tongue
 Dwell on His love with sweetest song;
 And infant voices shall proclaim
 Their early blessings on His name.
 
 c) Let every creature rise and bring
 His grateful honors to our King;
 Angels descend with songs again,
 And earth repeat the loud "Amen!"

Canticles English.Title: God sent His son,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
God sent His son,
 they called Him, Jesus;
 He came to love, heal and forgive;
 He lived and died to buy my pardon,
 An empty grave is there to prove my Savior lives!
 
 Because He lives, I can face tomorrow,
 Because He lives, all fear is gone,
 Because I know He holds the future,
 And life is worth the living,
 Just because He lives!
 
 b) How sweet to hold a newborn baby,
 And feel the pride and joy he brings;
 But greater still the calm assurance:
 This child can face uncertain days because He Lives!
 
 c) And then one day, I'll cross the river,
 I'll fight life's final war with pain;
 And then, as death gives way to victory,
 I'll see the lights of glory and I'll know He lives!

Canticles English.Title: Fairest Lord Jesus,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Fairest Lord Jesus,
 Ruler of all nature,
 O Thou of God and man the Son,
 Thee will I cherish, Thee will I honor,
 Thou, my soulâ€™s glory, joy and crown.
 
 b) Fair are the meadows, fairer still the woodlands,
 Robed in the blooming garb of spring;
 Jesus is fairer, Jesus is purer,
 Who makes the woeful heart to sing.
 
 c) Fair is the sunshine,
 Fairer still the moonlight,
 And all the twinkling starry host;
 Jesus shines brighter, Jesus shines purer
 Than all the angels heaven can boast.
 
 d) All fairest beauty, heavenly and earthly,
 Wondrously, Jesus, is found in Thee;
 None can be nearer, fairer or dearer,
 Than Thou, my Savior, art to me.
 
 e) Beautiful Savior! Lord of all the nations!
 Son of God and Son of Man!
 Glory and honor, praise, adoration,
 Now and forever more be Thine.

Canticles English.Title: Some may know Him only as
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Some may know Him only as
 A little baby in a manger
 Born to Joseph and Mary
 With no room in the inn
 some may know Him as the one
 Who was rejected by His kin
 But there's so much more to Him
 There is so much more to Him
 
 He's the Bread of Life
 And the door to heaven
 He's the light of the world
 The resurrection and the life
 He's the shepherd of our souls
 He is the true vine
 The way the truth and the life
 
 Some may think He's only just
 Another prophet of the world
 A good teacher and a man
 Who could many a people heal
 Some may know Him as the one
 Who died upon a tree
 But Hes so much more to me
 He is so much more to me
 
 He's the one who holds my hand
 Picks me up so I can stand
 He's the one who's always near
 And he tells me do not fear
 He's the one who calls my name
 He's my comfort In the storm
 My provider and protector
 And nothing can keep me from His love
 
 And some day I will see his glorious face
 And then as His bride I will take my place
 As I wait for this day
 There's one thing I say
 Even so come Jesus come

Canticles English.Title: I’m rejoicing night and day
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Iâ€™m rejoicing night and day
 As I walk the narrow way,
 For the hand of God in all my life I see;
 And the reason of my bliss,
 Yes, the secret all is this:
 That the Comforter abides with me.
 
 He abides, He abides;
 Hallelujah, He abides with me!
 Iâ€™m rejoicing night and day
 As I walk the narrow way,
 For the Comforter abides with me.
 
 b) Once my heart was full of sin,
 Once I had no peace within,
 Till I heard how Jesus died upon the tree;
 Then I fell down at His feet,
 And there came a peace so sweet;
 Now the Comforter abides with me.
 
 c) Thereâ€™s no thirsting for the things
 Of the worldâ€”theyâ€™ve taken wings;
 Long ago I gave them up, and instantly
 All my night was turned to day,
 All my burdens rolled away;
 Now the Comforter abides with me.

Canticles English.Title: He's still working on me
Canticles English.Lyrics:
He's still working on me
 To make me what I need to be
 It took him just a week to make the moon and stars
 The sun and the earth and Jupiter and Mars
 How loving and patient He must be,
 â€˜Cause He's still workinâ€™ on me
 
 a) There really ought to be a sign upon my heart
 Don't judge him yet, there's an â€˜unfinished part
 But I'll be better just according to His plan
 Fashioned by the Master's loving hands
 
 b) In the mirror of His word
 Reflections that I see
 Makes me wonder why He never gave up on me
 But He loves me as I am and helps me when I pray
 Remember He's the potter; I'm the clay

Canticles English.Title: There's within my heart a melody
Canticles English.Lyrics:
There's within my heart a melody
 Jesus whispers sweet and low:
 Fear not, I am with thee, peace, be still,
 in all of life's ebb and flow.
 
 Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,
 sweetest name I know,
 fills my every longing,
 keeps me singing as I go.
 
 b) All my life was wrecked by sin and strife,
 discord filled my heart with pain;
 Jesus swept across the broken strings,
 stirred the slumbering chords again.
 
 c) Though sometimes he leads through waters deep,
 trials fall across the way,
 though sometimes the path seems rough and steep,
 see his footprints all the way.
 
 d) Feasting on the riches of his grace,
 resting neath his sheltering wing,
 always looking on his smiling face,
 that is why I shout and sing.
 (Refrain)
 
 e) Soon he's coming back to welcome me
 far beyond the starry sky;
 I shall wing my flight to worlds unknown;
 I shall reign with him on high

Canticles English.Title: Gone is the guilt of my sin,
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Gone is the guilt of my sin,
 Peace is now reigning within;
 Since I believed, pardon received,
 Happy, so happy I've been!
 
 New Life in Christ! Abundant and free!
 What glories shine, what joys are mine,
 What wondrous blessings I see!
 My past with its sin,
 The searching and strife,
 Forever gone, there's a bright new dawn!
 For in Christ I have found New Life!
 
 b) Brighter the journey each day,
 Tho there is much to dismay;
 Heaven awaits - Bright pearly gates,
 There at the end of the way.
 
 c) Come with your sin-burdened heart,
 Christ will his cleansing impart;
 He will forgive - in him you'll live,

Canticles English.Title: Over all the earth, You reign on high
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Over all the earth, You reign on high
 Every mountain stream every sunset sky
 But my one request Lord, my only aim
 Is that You'd reign in me again
 
 Lord reign in me reign in Your power
 Over all my dreams in my darkest hour
 You are the Lord of all I am
 So won't You reign in me again
 
 Over every thought over every word
 May my life reflect the beauty of my Lord
 'Cause You mean more to me than any earthly thing
 So won't You reign in me again

Canticles English.Title: I lay my life down at your feet
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I lay my life down at your feet
 'Cause you're the only one I need
 I turn to You and You are always there
 In troubled times, it's You I seek
 I put You first, that's all I need
 I humble all I am all to You
 
 One way, Jesus, You're the only one that I could live for
 
 You are always, always there
 Everyhow and everywhere
 Your grace abounds so deeply within me
 You will never, ever change
 Yesterday, today the same
 Forever till forever meets no end
 
 You are the way, the truth and the life
 I live by faith and not by sight for You
 We're livin' all for You

Canticles English.Title: I meet with You and my soul sings out
Canticles English.Lyrics:
I meet with You and my soul sings out
 As your word throws doubt far away
 I sing to You and my heart cries
 "Holy! Hallelujah, Father, You're near!"
 
 My hope is in You, Lord
 All the day long, I won't be shaken by drought or storm
 A peace that passes understanding is my song
 And I sing my hope is in You, Lord
 
 I wait for You and my soul finds rest
 In my selfishness, You show me grace
 I worship You and my heart cries "Glory
 Hallelujah, Father, You're here!"
 
 I will wait on You
 You are my refuge
 I will wait on You
 You are my refuge

Canticles English.Title: Living below in this old sinful world
Canticles English.Lyrics:
Living below in this old sinful world
 Hardly a comfort can afford
 Striving alone to face temptation so
 (Now brother won't you tell me)

तेरी आराधना है मधुर गीत-2,
जीवन से मेरे तू महिमा पाये
एक ही कामना करूँ
पाप क्षमा कर...

सृष्टि के हर एक कण कण में
छाया है तेरी ही महिमा का राज,
पक्षी भी करते हैं तेरी प्रशंसा -2
हर पल सुनाते हैं आनंद का राग-2
मेरी भी भक्ति तुझे ग्रहण हो,
ह्रदय से प्रार्थना करूँ,
पाप क्षमा कर...

पतित जीवन में ज्योति जला दे,
तुझ ही से लगी है आशा मेरी
पापमय दम तू दूर हटा दे -2
पूर्ण हो अभिलाषा मेरी – 2
जीवन के कठिन दुखी क्षणों का,
दृढ़ता से समाना करूँ,
पाप क्षमा...

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु मेरा चरवाहा,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
यीशु मेरा चरवाहा,
मैं उसका गुण गाता हूं,
छोटी उसकी भेड़ उसके पीछे जाता हूं।

हरियाली चारागाह मुझे चराता है
और निर्मल सोतों से मुझे पिलाता है,
वह आगे आगे चलता है, रक्षा भी करता जाता है,
उसकी मधुर वाणी से मैं तृप्त हो जाता हूं

मौत की घाटी से मुझे ले जाता है,
जंगल के खतरों से मुझे बचाता है,
वह मरहम पट्टी करता है, ढाढ़स भी मुझे देता है,
उसकी प्रेम सेवा से मैं आनन्द पाता हूं
दुश्मन के सामने वह मेज़ बिछाता है,
कटोरा आनन्द से वह उमड़ा जाता है,                                                                                                     वह पाक पवित्र करता है,                                                                                                                 आत्मा का दान देता है,                                                                                                                           उसकी रोज़ सहायता से मै जय जय पाता हूं।

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु का दरबार रे मोहे प्यारा लगत है(2)

b) तेरे दरबार मसीह,
कौन-कौन है बैठे
पंडित मूर्ख गवार रे,
मोहे प्यारा लगत है

c) तेरे दरबार मसीह,
क्या-क्या है मिलता-
मुक्ति, शान्ति अपार रे
मोहे प्यारा लगत है;

d) तेरे दरबार मसीह, हम सब आये-
सुन ले प्रभु जी पुकार रे मोहे प्यारा लगत है-

Canticles Hindi.Title: हम सब आतें हैं, करने स्तुति

हल्लेलूयाह

याह की स्तुति

आमीन

Canticles Hindi.Title: हे सृष्टि के रचने वाले, तेरी जय जयकार हो

पाप से मुक्ति देने को

Canticles Hindi.Title: आज का ये दिन शुभ दिन है
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
आज का ये दिन शुभ दिन है
आज की ये रात शुभ रात
आओ हम करे प्यार से शुरु
प्यार के मसीहा की बात
तेरे लिए मेरे लिए
आया है वो सब के लिए-2

ऐसा प्यार देखा ना कभी
ऐसा प्यार पाया ना कभी‐2
प्यार में उसके गैरों ने भी अपनापन पाया
मेरा हर दिन नया दिन है
मेरी हर रात नई रात

प्यार मसीह का मेरी हिम्मत प्यार मेरा साया
हर कदम कदम वो है मेरे संग

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु है सच्चा गडरिया
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
यीशु है सच्चा गडरिया

हरी चराइयों में, हमें चराता है

वादी पहाड़ों में ले चलता है
जहाँ पर सुखदाई झरने बहते हैं

मार्गों में मेरी रक्षा वो करता है
शैतान के हाथों से हमें छुड़ाता है

हमको किसी का अब तो डर नहीं है

Canticles Hindi.Title: मेरा यीशु है कितना महान,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
मेरा यीशु है कितना महान,

उसके चरणों में सजदा करूँ, वो ही तो है मेरा खुदा
हालेलुयाह-(6)

तूने बनाई धरती आसमां, अपने एक शब्द के द्वारा
तूने सजाई है चारों ओर दिशा, अपने सामर्थ के द्वारा
क्या है इंसान जो तू उसे याद करे
क्या है इंसान जो तू उसे प्यार करे

तू है पवित्र यहोवा एलशदाय, तू है शालोम यहोवा एडोनाय
तेरी इच्छा से तुफान उठे, तेरी आज्ञा से, आँधी थम जाएँ
क्या है इन्सान जो तू, उसे याद करे
क्या है इन्सान जो तू उसे प्यार करे

Canticles Hindi.Title: हाले हाल्लेलूयाह ,हाल्लेलूयाह, हाल्लेलूयाह
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
हाले हाल्लेलूयाह ,हाल्लेलूयाह, हाल्लेलूयाह

a) हो तेरी स्तुति और आराधना,

महिमा से तेरी तू इस जगह को भर,
जो भी चाहे तू यहां पर कर

b) करुणा से तेरी नया दिन दिखा,
दया से तेरी मुझको बचाता है,
जब में पुकारूँ तू दौड़ा आता है,
जब मैं गिरूँ तो मुझे उठाता है

c) सारे जहां में तुझसा कोई नही,
तेरे सिवा कोई प्रभु ही नहीं,
घुटने मैं टेकूं बस तेरे ही सामने,
तू मेरा प्रभु तू मेरा खुदा

Canticles Hindi.Title: भजने के लिए सिरजे गए हम
Canticles Hindi.Scale:

आदि में था वचन, वचन परमेश्वर के संग
वचन परमेश्वर ही था सब कुछ हुआ वचन द्वारा । 2
महिमा सामर्थ आदर के योग्य, मेरा प्रभु यीशु । 2

आकाश और पृथ्वी बनाया, सारे जगत को रचाया,
तुझको भी अपने स्वरूप में, इंसान करके बना । 2
महिमा, सामर्थ आदर के योग्य मेरा प्रभु यीशु। 2

दुनिया बनाने से पहले, चुना था मुझको दया से,
करने तेरी धन्य सेवा, आत्मा, सच्चाई आशा से। 2
महिमा, सामर्थ, आदर के योग्य, मेरा प्रभु यीशु । 2

सुख: में सदा साथ रहता है वह

अपने पापों से तुम भी बचो
शैतान से हम को बचाता है वह, जगत के शैतान से तुम भी बचो

बनाया हम को हम उस के ही है

Canticles Hindi.Title: हो जय जयकार जय जयकार करे
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
हो जय जयकार जय जयकार करे

a) वो है हमारा राजा राजा
दुःख संकट से बचाता बचाता
हम पर आपनी करुणा करता और करता उपकार
क्यों न उस पर तन मन वारे दे अपना अधिकार
b) स्वर्ग है उसका सिंहासन सिंहासन
पृथ्वी बनी है आसन आसन

सारी पृथ्वी उसकी रचना, उसका ही प्रताप

c) उस पर जिसका भरोसा भरोसा
वो तो कभी न डिगेगा डिगेगा
चाहे बीमारी चाहे गरीबी चाहे हो आकाल
सब संकट से सब कष्टों से हो जायेगा पार

Canticles Hindi.Title: तेरे गीतों को गाता चलूंगा
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
तेरे गीतों को गाता चलूंगा

खुशियाँ हो या ग़म के नज़ारे
बढ़ता चलूंगा तेरे सहारे

चाहे हो तराई, या हरी चराई
तू ही है यीशु, सच्चा साथी
तू ही काफी है, तू ही शाफी है
तू बढ़ाता है, तू चलाता है

मैं अपनी, आंखों को, उठाता हूँ उस खुदा की ओर
आकाश और पृथ्वी के कर्त्ता, प्रभु की ओर
वो ना ऊंघेगा, वो ना सोयेगा,
मेरे पांव को टेलने न देना

Canticles Hindi.Title: तू मेरा शरण स्थान
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
तू मेरा शरण स्थान

संकट में मेरा दोस्त
मेरा प्रभु

आराधना करूँ मै पूरे दिल से
मैं तुझे ढूँढूगा सम्पूर्ण जीवन से
तेरी सेवा करूंगा तन मन और धन से
मैं हूँ यहाँ मैं हूँ यहाँ प्रभु मैं हूँ यहाँ

उधारक मेरा तू, मेरी चंगाई है
संकट में  सामर्थ है, मेरा प्रभु

तू मेरा गीत है, मेरा संगीत है
तू मेरी आशा, मेरा प्रभु

Canticles Hindi.Title: प्रभु हमारा शरणस्थान और बल,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
प्रभु हमारा शरणस्थान और बल,
मुसीबत में हरदम, मद्दगार हैं

a) चाहे यह पृथ्वी उलट भी जाये, पहाड सागर में गिर भी जाये
चाहे समुदर भी गर्जन करें, पर्वत लहरों से हिलने लगे,
मगर हमे डेर उनसे कूछ भी नही

b) शांत रहो जाना मैं हूँ खुदा, सभी जातियों में सबसे बड़ा,
सेनाओं का प्रभु है साथ में, वही बस हमारी पनाह भी है,
लिहाजा हमें डर कोई भी नहीं

Canticles Hindi.Title: हे परमेश्वर मैं तुझे सराहूंगा
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
हे परमेश्वर मैं तुझे सराहूंगा
तेरे नाम को सदा धन्य कहूंगा
तेरा धन्यवाद ही करता रहूंगा
तेरी स्तुती सदा करूंगा। (2)

a) तु गिरे को संभालता हैं
सब झुके को सीधा करता हैं
समय पर आहार देता हैं
स्तुती के योग्य तू प्रभु।

b) विरोधी से तू बनाता है
शत्रु के सामने जयवंत करता है
समय पर सहारा देता है
स्तुति के योग्य तू प्रभु।

Canticles Hindi.Title: प्रभु का कर धन्यवाद,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
प्रभु का कर धन्यवाद,
ऐ मेरे मन, प्रभु का कर धन्यवाद

a) प्रभु के पावन नाम का कर धन्यवाद
उसके उपकारों के लिए कर धन्यवाद

b) तेरे पापों को प्रभु ने क्षमा की
रोग तेरे दूर किए और दी चंगाई

c) भलाइयों से तृप्त वो करता
तेरी जवानी में शक्ति वो देता

d) अपने सन्तानों पर करता है वो दया,
भक्तों को अपने प्रेम वो करता

e) घास के समान है हमारा ये जीवन
मैदान के फूल समान मुर्झा जाते

Canticles Hindi.Title: सुन लो मेरे भाइयों,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
सुन लो मेरे भाइयों,
मसीह जी मेरे दुनिया में आया।

a) दुनिया में आया, मुक्ति को लाया,
पापी का प्राण बचाया, बचाने इस दुनिया में आया।

b) स्वर्गीय पिता का एकलौता बेटा,
मनुष्य पुत्र कहलाया, कहलाने यीशु दुनिया में आया।

c) अन्धों को आखे, गूगो को बोली,
बहारों के शब्द सुनाया, सुनाने यीशु दुनिया में आया।

d) कोढी अपाहिज चंगे किये है,
मुर्दो को आन जिलाया, जिलाने यीशु दुनिया में आया।

e) हम जब गुनाह में पड़े हुए थे,
अद्भुत प्रेम दिखाया, दिखाने यीशु दुनिया में आया।
f) दुनिया की खातिर क्रस पर चढ़कर,
अपना रक्त बहाया, बहाने यीशु दुनिया में आया।

g) जो कोई उस पर विश्वास लाया,
उसको मसीह ने बचाया, बचाने यीशु दुनिया में आया।

Canticles Hindi.Title: जय देने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
जय देने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
कोटि-कोटि धन्यवाद
जीवन देने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
जीवन भर धन्यवाद ।

हल्लेलुयाह (२) गायेंगे
आत्मा से भरकर गायेंगे
यीशु जिन्दा है, वह आने वाला है। (२)

शांति देने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
कोटि-कोटि धन्यवाद
मुक्ति देने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
जीवन भर धन्यवाद ।

चंगा करने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
कोटि-कोटि धन्यवाद
छुटकारा देने वाले प्रभु यीशु को
जीवन भर धन्यवाद ।

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु तू अच्छा है, यीशु तू अच्छा है
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
यीशु तू अच्छा है, यीशु तू अच्छा है
येशु तु अच्छा है, तू बहुत अच्छा है

यीशु मेरे लिए आया, तो मेरे लिए जिया, तू बहुत अच्छा है
यीशु मेरे लिए मरा, यो मेरे लिए जो उठा, तू बहुत अच्छा है

मेरे पापा को, यीशु क्षमा किया
तू बहुत अच्छा है
मुझे मुक्ती दिलाये, मुझे शांतो दिलायी तू बहुत अच्छा है

मुझे चंगा किया, मुझे शक्ति दिया
तू बहुत अच्छा हैं।
मुझे जीवन दिलायी मुझे खुशिया दिलायी त बहुत अच्छा है

Canticles Hindi.Title: चाहे अंजीर के ये पेड़ फले ना फले
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
चाहे अंजीर के ये पेड़ फले ना फले
चाहे मेरी बाड़ी में अंगूर खिले ना खिले
चाहे मेरे खेत में फसल उगे ना उगे

तो भी मैं तो अपने प्रभु में आनंदित और मगन रहूंगा - (२)
हालेलुया यीशु की जय, शांति देने वाले की जय जय जय
हालेलुया यीशु की जय, मुक्ति देने वाले की जय जय जय
हालेलुया यीशु की जय

चाहे सम्मान के बदले अपमान मिले
नाकामयाबी बार बार मेरे हाथ लगे,
लोगों में नाम की जगह बदनामी मिले

Canticles Hindi.Title: प्रभु यीशु तू ही मेरा
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
प्रभु यीशु तू ही मेरा
सच्चा खुदा ।

तेरी मुहब्बत, सूली पर, देखा
मेरे बदले मे मेरी नज़ात, मौत सहा

मैं गुनाहों में, पड़ा हुआ था।
तुने मुझे मेरे गुनाहों से, माफी दिया।

मै आंसुओं में, डूबा हुआ था
तूने मुझे मेरे गम को हटा, खुशियां दिया ।

Canticles Hindi.Title: क्रूस की दास्ताँ सुनले ये जहां
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
क्रूस की दास्ताँ सुनले ये जहां
तुझ पर प्यार लुटाने
तेरी बिगड़ी को बनाने
खुदा ही राह दिखाने जहां में आगया
क्रूस की ......
a) कोड़ो की मार सही
क़िलो से टोखा गया
मुख पे धुखा गया
चाटों से मारा गया
फिर भी पुकारा उसने
मांग पिता से उसने
इने तू माफ़ करना ये नादान है
माफ़ी की दुआ मागने आया था

b) जिसने पाप न जाना
उसी को पापी माना
जिसका दोष न कोई
उसी ने सूली ड़ोही
यीशु डाकू से बोला आज छूटेगा छोला
तू मेरे संग रहेगा
तू मेरे संग चलेगा
अनंत जीवन देने जहां में आगया

c) जिया वह तेरी खातिर
मारा वह तेरी खातिर
आत्मा से सनादन
देदिया उसने ये बदन
अर्पित मन से उसने आत्मा को चढ़ाया
तन और मन को लेकर शरण में उसके आया
पिता से हमको मिलाने जहां में आगे

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु के नाम में उद्धार बा,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
यीशु के नाम में उद्धार बा,
प्रेम बिना जिंदगी बेकार बा (२)
बेकार बा (३) होई, (२)
प्रेम बिना जिंदगी बेकार बा

माटी के देहिया माटी मा मिली जाई
एहिजा के धनवा का मोह नाही आई
पाप से भरत संसार बा, प्रेम बिना जिंदगी बेकार बा

मनवा फिरावा तू यीशु जी में आईके
फाइदा ना होई कोनो गिरिजा मा जाईके
धरम-करम सब नाम बा, प्रेम बिना जिंदगी बेकार बा

Canticles Hindi.Title: सोच सोच के दिन ये बीत गए
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
सोच सोच के दिन ये बीत गए
न जाने फिर कल क्या होगा?
ये जान ले मेहेज़ इन्सां है तू, तेरी सोच से क्या होगा?

उड़ते पंछियों को देख,
बोते ना काटते
फिर भी खिलता है खुदा उन्हें,
तू तो कहीं बढ़कर है

पा ले गर तू संसार को,
खो दे खुद की आत्मा को
द्वार स्वर्ग का बंद हो जायेगा,
अपनी आत्मा बचालो

ना बन मूर्ख के समान तू,
कि समेटे धन और अनाज को,
आज रात प्राण जो चला जायेगा, आत्मा को भी खो देगा।

सोच सोच के गवाओं दिन न यूँ
पहले स्वर्ग की राज्य खोजो,
सारी वस्तुएं तुम्हें मिल जाएंगे,
वादा खुदा का है वह!

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु तेरे दिल में आना चाहता है,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
यीशु तेरे दिल में आना चाहता है,
यीशु तेरे दिल में रहना चाहता है
आसमाँ का राजा तुझको चाहता है,

खोल दे दिल अपना, मान ले उसका कहना

अंधियारे जहाँ में, हम सब खो गये थे,
सृष्टिकर्ता से जुदा, हम सब हो गए थे
आया वो आसमाँ से, मुक्ति का द्वार बनके
नफरत को मिटाने, आया वो प्यार बनके
दे कर ज़िन्दगी वो, तुझको चाहता है
खोल दे दिल अपना ...

यीशु आया है देने ज़िन्दगी,
यीशु आया है देने हर खुशी (२)

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु का नाम है
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
यीशु का नाम है
मीठा नाम है

Canticles Hindi.Title: नंमते है चरणों में तेरे प्रभु
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
नंमते है चरणों में तेरे प्रभु

a) अतुल्य प्रेम है किया
मानव रूप धारण किया
पापो के सजा हमारे वो सहकर
मौत को अपना लिया
हाल्लेलूया आमीन हा हाल्लेलूया

b) असीम दया किया
मानव पर तरस खाया
भुको को तृप्त किया
प्यासो को जल दिया
लोगो को खुशियां दिय्या
हाल्लेलूया  आमीन हा हाल्लेलूया

c) तेरी है मौजूदगी
मेरी इस जीवन में
तेरा और मेरा इस
बंदन नो टूटेगा
भाग्यशाली में हुआ
हाल्लेलूया  आमीन हा हाल्लेलूया

Canticles Hindi.Title: येशु मसीह देता ख़ुशी,
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
येशु मसीह देता ख़ुशी,

पैदा हुआ बना इंसान,
देखो भागा शैतान,
ला - ला - ला - ला  - २

देखो भागा शैतान - २

b) गिरने वालो उठो चलो,
येशु बुलाता तुम्हे

जिंदा हुआ है येशु - २

c) झुक जाएगा आसमा एक दिन,

में धन्यवाद करता रहूँगा,

धन्यवाद धन्यवाद धन्यवाद धन्यवाद। (२)

b) में जो पापों में डूब हुआ था,

तूने मुझे है छुडाया,

c) येशु ने ऐसा प्रेम जताया,

Canticles Hindi.Scale:

Canticles Hindi.Title: सब कुछ नया-नया बिल्कुल बदलता गया। 2
Canticles Hindi.Scale:

Canticles Hindi.Scale:

Canticles Hindi.Scale:
अपनी जवानी के दिन सभी

a) ऐसी हो निर्मल तेरी जवानी

प्रार्थना करने में बीते हर पल

b) प्रभु के भय में तू. जो चलेगा

c) प्रभु को पाने की कुंजी यही है

प्रार्थना भक्ति करना नियम से

कल की कलीसिया तुझ पर बने
कोई तो ऐसा विश्वास दे। अपनी.....

Canticles Hindi.Title: योग्य तू है योग्य
Canticles Hindi.Scale:
योग्य तू है योग्य
मेरी समझ से परे, अंदाजा नहीं मुझे, तेरी महिमा कैसी है
मैं न बतला पाऊँ कितना गहरा तेरा प्रेम,
कानों ने सुना था प्रभु, अब देखा आँखों ने

तू योग्य (३)
तू है योग्य स्तुति के, हमेशा के लिए (२)

महिमा दूँ मैं उसे जिसने बनाया मुझको
तूने खोजा और चुदवाया मेरी शर्म से मुझको

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु तेरा नाम है महान
Canticles Hindi.Scale:

तारणहारा यीशु मसीह

नजात दिलाने सूली चढ़ा

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु है मेरा, प्यारा मसीहा
Canticles Hindi.Scale:

उस के नाम से पाया मैं, सदा की यह जीवन,
उस के नाम से मिला है, मुझे जीवन भर खुशी
कितना महान है तेरा नाम, पाया जो मेने शान्ति

योग्य है जो यीशु मेरा, सारी महिमा और स्तुति की,

Canticles Hindi.Title: कितना है अद्भुत सुसमाचार

Canticles Hindi.Title: मैं हूँ पापी, तु पवित्र

मेरे पापों को तू ढ़ापता है
उद्याचल से अस्ताचल जितनी दूर है
उतनी दूर तू करता है मेरे पापों को।

प्रेम कैसा तेरा अनूठा है

अपने हाथों से संभालता प्रभु तू मुझे

Canticles Hindi.Title: तेरा दिल खुश हो जाये ओह मेरे मसीह
Canticles Hindi.Scale:

a) न ज्ञान पे अपनी घमंड में करूं
न ताकत पे अपनी भरोसा धरूँ

की जानता हूँ तुझको ऐ मेरे प्रभु ।  (यिर्मयाह 9:23)

b) बुराई के बदले बुरा न करूं
(रोम 12:17)

(रोम 12:21)
मेरे कामों से तुझको प्रसन्न करूँ।

c) तेरे सूली को जब भी मैं देखूँ सही
तेरे प्यार में डूब मैं जाता मसीह
कैसा तूने पिता को प्रसन्न किया (Col1:19,20)

तेरा मन कहां।

भरपूरी है उसके पास
है प्रेम उसका कितना महान
देगा तुझको वह अनंत जीवन

Canticles Hindi.Title: मेरे खुदा, मेरा मसीहा
Canticles Hindi.Scale:

मेरे खुदा...

वो आता है यीशु, लेने मुझे

जागते हम रहे

Canticles Hindi.Scale:

तूने आकर है बचाया
तेरी महिमा हर पल प्रभु जी

a) मेरा मरना ही था वाजिब,
गुनाह ऐसे किये

हम थे पापी (रोम 5.6-8)
यीशु हुआ. क्रूस पर मुआ.
वह था मेरे लिए, प्रभु जी
वह हमारे लिए, यीशु जी

b) अनंत जीवन है तुझ ही में,
और कहाँ जाऊ
मरके भी जीवन तुझी में,
मैं क्यों भय खाऊं मरनहार देहों,
को भी अपने, आत्मा के द्वारा तू
जिलाएगा (रोम 8:11)
सपूर्ण उद्धार के दिन प्रभुजी.
मेरे प्रभु के दिन यीशुजी

c) ऐ मेरे मूरख ओ मनवा,
यू न भटका जा
यीशु के प्रेम वीडियो का,
खुद का गुलाम बना
बन के उसका दास फिर तू,
गीत आजादी के गायेगा
सन्ना सुनाएगा प्रभु की,
सन्ना सुनाए जा यीशु की

Canticles Hindi.Title: यीशु आये चरनी में

यीशु आये चरनी में

हा हा हालेलुयाह

हा हा हालेलुयाह
हाहा हालेलुयाह हाँ
हो हो हो हो सन्ना-2
गाएंगे हो सन्ना ही

हा हा हालेलुयाह
हाहा हालेलुयाह हाँ
हो हो हो हो सन्ना-2
गाएंगे हो सन्ना ही

Canticles Hindi.Scale:

Canticles Hindi.Title: जय जय बोलो जाय जय

मौत लेके जीवन देने आया था वो
